alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 7:26PM CST until January 29 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River at Macon. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Significant overflow into lowland and cattle grazing land near the Highway 45 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 26.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 28.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 28.0 26.7 Thu 7 pm CST 28.5 26.9 27.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 930 AM CST.
